attributes.action: Decide if he is going to continue supporting Scotish University students whilst the English Students (the ones whom he apparently is the Head of Government for) continue to pay for education?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scotish University Students do not have to pay for their education, which is the way it should be, and also the way that Gordon Brown had it whilst growing up.
However, in England, students have increasing amounts of debt, which is not only affecting the economy, but also affecting the number of students attending University.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
